title: Gnostic Goddess of Wisdom and the Great Reset Awakening with Marisa Acocella!
cleaned_text:
On today’s episode of the Conspiracy Theories and Unpopular Culture podcast we are joined by a woman who brings us the granola vibes of optimism for 2021! Marisa Acocella is a cartoonist that has New York Times bestsellers like Ann Tenna and Cancer Vixen. She’s also been a cartoonist for the New Yorker and Oprah’s W magazine. Her works have been in New York Times, Glamour, and Oprah’s O Magazine. She shares her perspective of the world through her latest graphic novel called “The Big She-Bang: The Herstery of the Universe According to God the Mother! (*a beautiful graphic novel that you can win from me- it’s a signed copy that I’ll put into a big old package with one of my signed books and one of my ultra soft tshirts!). We’ll talk about the clashing of Great Reset and Great Awakening timelines, Gnosticism, Mary Magdalene’s royal bloodlines, Santa Klaus Schwab, the Archons, COVID treatments (*her father is a nutritionist doctor so listen up to his recommendation of how to combat the virus with some over the counter supplements) and more!

I also finish my February shout outs that I missed on the last show!
• THE GIVEAWAY WILL BE HELD ON MARCH 1st 2021!!!! You could win: A signed hardcover of THE BIG SHE-BANG, a signed copy of THE DARK PATH and a Conspiracy Theories & Unpopular Culture t-shirt! Over $100 value and I’ll ship it right to you! All you have to do to enter is be a member of one of my supporter platforms and I’ll randomly choose one winner from each platform (e.g. one winner from Rokfin, one from Patreon and one from the VIP Section). Currently VIP Section has by far the least amount of people in it and the greatest chance of winning. Odds of winning (as of Feb 16, 2021): Rokfin is 1:204, Patreon is 1:1,134 and VIP Section is 1:57.
• Be a supporter on the VIP Section (this page compares the three support systems- choose whichever you like most: https://illuminatiwatcher.com/members-section/)
• Be a supporter on Patreon.com/IlluminatiWatcher AND you have to leave the funniest comment on the post for the Marisa Acocella show- whoever makes me LOL the most wins! (*Patreon doesn’t allow random raffles cuz they hate making my laugh easy)
• Be a supporter on Rokfin.com/Creator/Isaac **For the Rokfin platform you have to subscribe through my link Rokfin.com/Creator/Isaac.
• Get Marisa’s books from her bookstore: https://bookshop.org/books/the-big-she-bang-the-herstory-of-the-universe-according-to-god-the-mother/9780062905666
• The recipe for helping fight the virus: Quercetin, Zinc, Vitamin D and Vitamin C
• *LIMITED TIME OFFER to first 1,000 supporters: Use promo code “HOTGIRLSUMMER” to get 20% off the VIP Section for 3 months!: https://illuminatiwatcher.com/members-section/
• Get your mega soft podcast t-shirts (the 2020 ‘Nerds are gonna kill us’ version) AND your signed paperbacks of ALIENS, UFOS & THE OCCULT USE YOUR ILLUSION I: https://gumroad.com/isaacw

Support the show: 1. SUBSCRIBE! 2. Leave a review! 3. Go commercial free with bonus content by getting in the VIP Section!

LISTEN TO THE SHOW HERE:

Listen to the show on the iTunes or Stitcher feeds (**and don’t forget to leave your reviews there as well!!**); or right here on the embed:

Listen to “Gnostic Goddess of Wisdom and the Great Reset Awakening with Marisa Acocella!” on Spreaker.

Today’s show is brought to you by my books on Audible! If you want to support the show search for “Isaac Weishaupt” on Audible or hit this link to get my most popular book- THE DARK PATH!

3. Go commercial free with bonus content by getting in the VIP Section!

Thanks again for all your support! If you want to stay connected please sign up for my free email newsletter which will get you updates on all groundbreaking revelations of occultism in entertainment (as well as occasional free giveaways)!

Website publisher of IlluminatiWatcher.com and top 5% Amazon author of THE DARK PATH; Isaac Weishaupt has been on the leading edge of conspiracy theories surrounding the elusive “Illuminati” and its infiltration of the entertainment industry. Using examples of familiar pop culture and works of entertainment, Isaac has been speaking and writing about the occult from a unique perspective that seeks to understand the big agenda while helping others along the way.

Isaac hosts the “Conspiracy Theories and Unpopular Culture” podcast (supported by the premium feeds on VIP Section, Rokfin, and IW Patreons). He has been a featured guest on Tin Foil Hat podcast, Chris Jericho’s “Talk is Jericho” podcast, “Those Conspiracy Guys,” Dave Navarro’s “Dark Matter Radio,” Richard C. Hoagland’s “Other Side of Midnight”, SIRIUS/XM’s The All Out Show, The HigherSide Chats, BLACKOUT Radio, Freeman Fly’s “The Free Zone”, Mark Devlin’s “Good Vibrations”, VICE, COMPLEX magazine, Esquire, The Atlantic and many more radio shows and podcasts. His fresh perspective and openly admitted imperfections promotes the rational approach to exploring these taboo subjects and conspiracy theories.

Follow Isaac on Instagram: @IsaacWeishaupt, Twitter: @IlluminatiEyes, Facebook: @IlluminatiWatcher, or sign up for the free email newsletter!

opengraph.title: Gnostic Goddess of Wisdom and the Great Reset Awakening with Marisa Acocella! - IlluminatiWatcher
opengraph.description: On today’s episode of the Conspiracy Theories and Unpopular Culture podcast we are joined by a woman who brings us the granola vibes of optimism for 2021! Marisa Acocella is a cartoonist that has New York Times bestsellers like Ann Tenna and Cancer Vixen. She’s also been a cartoonist for the New Yorker and Oprah’s W magazine. Her […]
